latoolsr 0.1.0.9008
  • Reference

    Get pre configurated learners

    get_configurated_learner.Rd

    Function for getting pre-configurated learners for convenience.

    get_configurated_learner(
  learner_name,
  use_smote = TRUE,
  autotuning = FALSE,
  smote_K = 1,
  smote_k_max = 6,
  smote_dup = 1,
  smote_dup_max = 5,
  inner_sampling,
  cr_optim,
  max_n_tuning
)

    Arguments

    learner_name

    Name of the learner to be used. See notes for more details.

    use_smote

    TRUE if smote should be applied. FALSE if not.

    autotuning

    TRUE if the learner should be auto tuned while learning. FALSE if not desired.

    smote_K

    Default value for applying smote.

    smote_k_max

    Maximum value for applying smote wihtin auto tuning.

    smote_dup

    Default value for applying smote.

    smote_dup_max

    Maximum value for applying smote wihtin auto tuning

    inner_sampling

    Kind of inner sampling for auto tuning.

    cr_optim

    Criterion for deciding about the best set of hyperparameters.

    max_n_tuning

    Maximum number of iterations for auto tuning.
